body_html:
@aryamccarthy your BLAS library must be depending on libirc.dylib, which prob is not in DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH. A full log of python setup.py install would help figure out the issue.

Additionally, you can debug this with:

otool -L /Users/Arya/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libATen.dylib

and then subsequently figuring out which of it's dependencies is bringing in that dependency

Additionally, you can debug this with:

and then subsequently figuring out which of it's dependencies is bringing in that dependency
body:
@aryamccarthy your BLAS library must be depending on libirc.dylib, which prob is not in DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH. A full log of `python setup.py install` would help figure out the issue.

Additionally, you can debug this with:

```
otool -L /Users/Arya/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libATen.dylib
```

and then subsequently figuring out which of it's dependencies is bringing in that dependency
